channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump believes Zelenskyy is willing to give up Crimea as part of a peace deal with Russia

item.title: White House displays lawn signs highlighting illegal immigrant crime

item.title: Getting Rid Of Food Dyes Is Good, But Healthy Eating Is Ultimately Up To Us
item.description: Fewer artificial dyes is great, but if Americans want to make their country healthy again, they can’t wait for the government to save them.

item.title: Trump’s border czar tells illegal immigrants they ‘cannot hide from ICE’ amid mass deportation agenda
item.description: Illegal immigrants will not be able to escape U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, President Donald Trump's border czar Tom Homan said Monday.

item.title: SCOOP: Dept of Energy says it saved $700M in Trump's first 100 days by cutting 'wasteful' programs

item.title: Harvard Does the Right Thing — Inadvertently
item.description: If the Trump administration’s big stick provokes a complacent Harvard into seeking more independence, that will be a good thing.

item.title: The First Amendment Isn’t Divided Against Itself
item.description: The Supreme Court should recognize the harmony of religious non-establishment and free exercise by allowing Oklahoma’s Catholic charter school.

item.title: White House touts 100-day illegal immigration crackdown after Biden 'unsecured the border on purpose'
item.description: ICE chief Tom Homan touted a 96% decrease in illegal border crossings under President Donald Trump's administration during a Monday press conference.

item.title: Harvard Cannot Claim To Champion Academic Freedom While Yielding To The CCP
item.description: Harvard University is making significant academic concessions to align with the Chinese Communist Party, according to a new report.

item.title: Yes, We Need Deportations Without Due Process
item.description: Only self-deportations will move the needle.

item.title: ABC Reporter Pretends Trump Wasn’t Shot While Accepting Award For Assassination Attempt Coverage
item.description: Does the propaganda press want us to forget Trump was shot and that there are still unanswered questions?

item.title: Does Pope Francis Have You Weeping?
item.description: His underappreciated plea for prayer and charity — and real love.

item.title: Up north and down here, &c.
item.description: On the Canadian election today and U.S. elections past; a Georgian violinist; Central Park in bloom; and more.
